# 工具类型

# 1.Record工具类型

该工具类约束了键值对的约束，一般用来约束对象。Record<T,U> 第一个参数是约束ke值，第二个参数是约束value值。如下：

interface pageInfo {
    name: string,
    age:number
}
const ar: Array<Record<string, pageInfo>> = [{
    'asdas': {
        name: '212',
        age:12
    }
}]

# 2.Partial工具类型

该工具类约束了范型的类型，只能包含其中的某项，超出范围的就会被报错

interface pageInfo {
    name: string,
    age:number
}

const s: Partial<pageInfo> = {
    name: '2112' //ok
}	

const s: Partial<pageInfo> = {
    name: '2112',//ok
    age: 2121,//ok
    c:1212 //报错
}

# 3.Extract 和 Exclude

Extract:接受两个范型，B的范型必须要在A的范型的范围内不然就会报错

type T0 = Extract<"a" | "b" | "c", "a" | "f">;
     
type T0 = "a"
type T1 = Extract<string | number | (() => void), Function>;
     
type T1 = () => void

Exclude:接受两个范型，B的范型必须不在A的范围内不然报错

type T0 = Exclude<"a" | "b" | "c", "a">;
 
type T0 = "b" | "c"
type T1 = Exclude<"a" | "b" | "c", "a" | "b">;
     
type T1 = "c"
type T2 = Exclude<string | number | (() => void), Function>;
     
type T2 = string | number

# Picker,Omit工具类型

picker接受两个类型，一个类型是规定的类型，第二个是规定的类型中选中的值，多一个不行少一个也不行。

interface Todo {
  title: string;
  description: string;
  completed: boolean;
}
 
type TodoPreview = Pick<Todo, "title" | "completed">;
 
const todo: TodoPreview = {
  title: "Clean room",
  completed: false
};

omit限制两个类型，和picker相反

interface Todo {
  title: string;
  description: string;
  completed: boolean;
}
 
type TodoPreview = Pick<Todo, "description">;
 
const todo: TodoPreview = {
  title: "Clean room",
  completed: false
};
